description: Fixed function parameter issues and added case-insensitive aliases
changes: Fixed PULL function to work without requiring the last 2 optional parameters
Made all function parameters properly optional using TypeScript optional syntax
Added case-insensitive function aliases (pull, create_plot_code, search_sensors, current, average)
Improved error reporting in CREATE_PLOT_CODE for better debugging of HTTP 500 errors
Added default value handling inside functions instead of relying on TypeScript defaults
All functions now work with minimal required parameters and proper defaults
Enhanced error messages to include status codes and response details for troubleshooting
